summary: Completed comprehensive testing of authenticated features including preferences page weight sliders and dashboard filters with z-50 fix. All core functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Authentication using test session token works correctly
Dashboard loads with proper user greeting ('Welcome back, Test User')
Preferences page navigation from dashboard works
All 5 weight sliders present and functional (consistency, volatility, performance, portfolio_quality, valuation)
Weight slider adjustments work correctly (0-50 range per bucket)
Total weight calculation updates dynamically and shows correct values
Save button enables/disables based on total weight = 100 validation
Save preferences functionality works when total = 100
Category dropdown opens with z-50 fix and shows all options (Flexi, LargeCap, MidCap, MultiCap, SmallCap)
History dropdown opens with z-50 fix and shows options (3+ Years, 5+ Years)
Apply filters button works and reloads fund list
Search functionality filters funds correctly (tested with 'ICICI')
Navigation between dashboard and preferences works bidirectionally
Warning message displays when total weight != 100
Toast notifications work for reset functionality
